Deps

The following libraries are dependencies of odoc.

  • Stdlib
  • Fpath
  • Cmdliner
  • Astring
  • Result
  • Yojson
  • Tyxml
  • Biniou
  • Odoc-parser
  • Fmt

Stdlib

  • Stdlib The OCaml Standard library.

Fpath

  • Fpath File system paths, file extensions, path sets and maps.

Cmdliner

  • Cmdliner Declarative definition of command line interfaces.

Astring

  • Astring Alternative Char and String modules.

Result

  • Result Result values.

Yojson

  • Yojson The Yojson library provides runtime functions for reading and writing JSON data from OCaml. It addresses a few shortcomings of its predecessor json-wheel and is about twice as fast (2.7x reading, 1.3x writing; results may vary). The design goals of Yojson are the following:

Tyxml

  • Tyxml Typed implementation for HTML, SVG and XML

Biniou

  • Bi_dump
  • Bi_inbuf Input buffer
  • Bi_io Input and output functions for the Biniou serialization format
  • Bi_outbuf Output buffer
  • Bi_share [not for general use]
  • Bi_stream Streaming utilities (experimental)
  • Bi_util Error handling etc.
  • Bi_vint Vint: variable-length representation of integers

Odoc-parser

  • Odoc_parser Parser for ocamldoc formatted comments.

Fmt

  • Fmt Format pretty-printer combinators.
  • Fmt_cli Cmdliner support for Fmt.
  • Fmt_tty Fmt TTY setup.
